title: Revert book cover photos to original versions

requirements.summary: Restore original book cover static assets by reverting book-cover-01.jpeg through book-cover-04.jpeg in frontend/public/assets/generated/ to the user-uploaded originals (BOOK (1).jpeg = गंगा की वाणी, BOOK (2).jpeg = मन के मोती, BOOK (3).jpeg = श्री कृष्ण दर्शन, BOOK (4).jpeg = वृद्धाश्रम) without altering image content or UI code
acceptanceCriteria: book-cover-01.jpeg in frontend/public/assets/generated/ matches the original BOOK (1).jpeg (गंगा की वाणी) uploaded by the user
book-cover-02.jpeg in frontend/public/assets/generated/ matches the original BOOK (2).jpeg (मन के मोती) uploaded by the user
book-cover-03.jpeg in frontend/public/assets/generated/ matches the original BOOK (3).jpeg (श्री कृष्ण दर्शन) uploaded by the user
book-cover-04.jpeg in frontend/public/assets/generated/ matches the original BOOK (4).jpeg (वृद्धाश्रम) uploaded by the user
The 'Books by Our Founder' section on Home page and About page display the correct original cover images without any AI-generated replacements
No other files or UI code are modified

file_operations.description: Replace the current file content with the original BOOK (1).jpeg (गंगा की वाणी) uploaded by the user. This file is referenced in Home.tsx and About.tsx as /assets/generated/book-cover-01.jpeg and must match the original user-uploaded version exactly.

Replace the current file content with the original BOOK (2).jpeg (मन के मोती) uploaded by the user. This file is referenced in Home.tsx and About.tsx as /assets/generated/book-cover-02.jpeg and must match the original user-uploaded version exactly.

Replace the current file content with the original BOOK (3).jpeg (श्री कृष्ण दर्शन) uploaded by the user. This file is referenced in Home.tsx and About.tsx as /assets/generated/book-cover-03.jpeg and must match the original user-uploaded version exactly.

Replace the current file content with the original BOOK (4).jpeg (वृद्धाश्रम) uploaded by the user. This file is currently missing from the Books by Our Founder section but was part of the original set and should be restored to frontend/public/assets/generated/book-cover-04.jpeg.
